Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.ExoMedia.HttpDataSourceFactoryProvider
    Use ExoMedia.DataSourceFactoryProvider instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.ExoMedia.Data.httpDataSourceFactoryProvider
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.exoplayer.ExoMediaPlayer.blockingClearSurface()
    use ExoMediaPlayer.clearSurface() as this is no longer blocking
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.exoplayer.ExoMediaPlayer.getSelectedTrackIndex(ExoMedia.RendererType)
    Use #getSelectedTrackIndex(RendererType, int)
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.ui.widget.VideoView.getVideoControls()
    Use VideoView.getVideoControlsCore()
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.ui.widget.VideoView.setControls(VideoControls)
    Use VideoView.setControls(VideoControlsCore)
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.ExoMedia.setHttpDataSourceFactoryProvider(ExoMedia.HttpDataSourceFactoryProvider)
    Use ExoMedia.setDataSourceFactoryProvider(DataSourceFactoryProvider) instead as it is more permissive
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.exoplayer.ExoMediaPlayer.setSelectedTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int)
    Use #setSelectedTrack(RendererType, int, int)
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.AudioPlayer.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int)
    Use AudioPlayer.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int, int)
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.api.AudioPlayerApi.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int)
    use AudioPlayerApi.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int, int)
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.api.VideoViewApi.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int)
    use VideoViewApi.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int, int)
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.video.exo.ExoVideoDelegate.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int)
    use ExoVideoDelegate.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int, int)
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.ui.widget.VideoView.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int)
    Use VideoView.setTrack(ExoMedia.RendererType, int, int)
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.ui.widget.VideoControls.setVideoView(VideoView)
    Use VideoControls.onAttachedToView(VideoView) and VideoControls.onDetachedFromView(VideoView)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.getstream.sdk.chat.utils.exomedia.core.source.MediaSourceProvider.SourceTypeBuilder(MediaSourceBuilder, String, String)
